com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.promotion

Interface Voucher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJcrVoucher

    @ProviderType
public interface Voucher
    Interface that describes a voucher. Note: this interface only describes a voucher outside of the context of a shopping cart. To get real-time info regarding the application of vouchers to a cart, use VoucherInfo.
    Since:
    5.6

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      Get the voucher code.
      ValueMap getConfig()

      Return an author-oriented description.
      java.lang.String getInvalidMessage(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
      Deprecated. 
      since 5.6.200; use getMessage(SlingHttpServletRequest) instead
      java.lang.String getMessage(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
      Return a shopper-visible message detailing the current status.
      java.lang.String getPath()
      Get the path of the voucher if represented in the repository.

      Get the priority.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Return an author-oriented title.

      Return if the voucher is currently valid.

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        java.lang.String getCode()
        Get the voucher code. This is normally the string the shopper would type into the cart. NB: while generally unique within a given time-frame, voucher codes are often reused in non-overlapping time-frames. It is also possible to use a priority to disambiguate several vouchers sharing the same voucher code.
        Returns:

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path of the voucher if represented in the repository. Otherwise, an ID uniquely identifying the voucher to the external commerce engine.
        Returns:

      • getTitle

        java.lang.String getTitle()
        Return an author-oriented title.
        Returns:

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Return an author-oriented description.
        Returns:

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Return if the voucher is currently valid. This is often used to enforce start and expiration dates, but actual semantics are implementation-dependent.
        Parameters:
        request - The request representing the current session
        Returns:

      • getPriority

        long getPriority()
        Get the priority. This allows vouchers sharing the same code (but coming from different campaigns) to be disambiguated.
        Returns:

      • getMessage

        java.lang.String getMessage(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Return a shopper-visible message detailing the current status.
        Parameters:
        request - The request representing the current session
        Returns:

      • getInvalidMessage

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getInvalidMessage(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Deprecated. since 5.6.200; use getMessage(SlingHttpServletRequest) instead
        Return a shopper-visible message detailing why the voucher is invalid.
        Parameters:
        request - The request representing the current session
        Returns:

      • getConfig

        ValueMap getConfig()
        Return a map of implementation-specific configuration properties.
        Returns:
